tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InfectiousDiseases (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name TEXT,
  location GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  location GEOGRAPHY(POINT),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE InfectiousDiseaseCases (
id INT PRIMARY KEY,
country VARCHAR(255),
city VARCHAR(255),
latitude FLOAT,
longitude FLOAT,
date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseSpreadAnalysis (
analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
source_city VARCHAR(255),
target_city VARCHAR(255),
simulation_result VARCHAR(255),
spread_probability FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE DiseaseControlMeasures (
measure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
measure_name VARCHAR(255),
measure_description TEXT,
implementation_date DATE,
measure_effectiveness FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location_id INT REFERENCES location_data(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Infections (
    infection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    disease_id INT,
    date_infected TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES Diseases(disease_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SpreadAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_id INT,
    disease_id INT,
    date_analyzed TIMESTAMP,
    affected_population INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (disease_id) REFERENCES Diseases(disease_id)
);
